Class UltrasonicPoller

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.ziplineproject.UltrasonicPoller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class UltrasonicPoller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Control of the wall follower is applied periodically by the UltrasonicPoller thread.
